metadata.title: CVE-2022-42930 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: If two Workers were simultaneously initializing their CacheStorage, a data race could have occurred in the ThirdPartyUtil component. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 106.

notes.note: mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
